name: correlate_page_results_tool
description: Correlates outputs from multiple analyzers for a single page into a unified_document structure. Call this AFTER running 2+ analyzers on the same page. Takes S3 URIs of analyzer results (full_text required as spine, plus diagram/table/chart/etc.), produces a correlated unified_document with enrichments attached to the content spine, saves to S3, and returns the S3 URI with a brief summary. Do NOT call for pages with only one analyzer result.

full_text_uri.description: S3 URI of the full_text_analyzer result (required as canonical spine)

analyzer_name.description: Name of the analyzer (e.g., diagram, table, chart)

s3_uri.description: S3 URI of the analyzer result

analyzer_uris.description: Array of other analyzer results to correlate with full_text

page_number.description: Page number or identifier for this correlation

unified_document_uri.description: S3 URI of the saved unified_document

summary.description: Brief summary of the correlation results
